name: Zombie Supplies
description:
Created for discord jam 3.

A game about supplying towers with resources so you can fight zombies.

Towers require power and materials to function. Workers will supply
materials where needed.

Containers will slowly produce material that can be used to supply towers or build other buildings.

Controls:

WASD to move the camera

1-3 to select buildings.

Click to order a structure built.
